definition: to let go/to cast/to let loose/to discharge/to give expression to
abbr. for 哈薩克斯坦|哈萨克斯坦[Ha1 sa4 ke4 si1 tan3], Kazakhstan/abbr. for 哈爾濱|哈尔滨[Ha1 er3 bin1], Harbin
(interj.) ha!/(onom. for laughter)/(slang) to be infatuated with/to adore/abbr. for 哈士奇[ha1 shi4 qi2], husky (dog)
to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat

pinyin: Sa1 ha1 la1 yi3 nan2 Fei1 zhou1

definition: Spanish Sahara (former Spanish colony in Africa)

sentences.english: Others were reported in the south of Western Sahara.
sentences.chinese: 另外，西撒哈拉沙漠南部也有蝗灾的报告。

sentences.english: Three wools forever have remembered Sahara's soul with hers writing.
sentences.chinese: 三毛用她的文字永远地记住了撒哈拉的灵魂。

sentences.english: Soon it will be hard to find the Blue Men of the Sahara.
sentences.chinese: 不久，撒哈拉沙漠的蓝人将成为一道稀有的风景线。

sentences.english: The village of Bardai is an oasis in the heart of the Sahara Desert.
sentences.chinese: 巴尔达伊村庄是撒哈拉沙漠中心地带的一个绿洲。

sentences.english: A member of a Berber people of northeast Algeria.
sentences.chinese: 一个撒哈拉沙漠游牧的柏柏尔民族成员。

sentences.english: Climate change has been like an on-off switch in the Sahara.
sentences.chinese: 气候变化好像撒哈拉的一个开关。

sentences.english: The history of oil in sub-Saharan Africa does not make for happy reading.
sentences.chinese: 撒哈拉以南非洲的石油历史读来并不让人愉快。

sentences.english: It is going to Saraha desert without a guide which is just a compass.
sentences.chinese: 这就如去撒哈拉沙漠而没有向导，少了指南针。

sentences.english: The need for aid is especially acute in Sub-Saharan Africa.
sentences.chinese: 撒哈拉以南非洲对援助的需要尤为急迫。

sentences.english: Miriam Salek, the Minister of Culture for the Western Saharan administration, highlights the festival's importance.
sentences.chinese: 西撒哈拉文化局长指出影展的重要性。

sentences.english: This is especially true in sub-Saharan Africa, which falls behind on all of the goals.
sentences.chinese: 撒哈拉沙漠以南的非洲地区落后于所有的目标。

sentences.english: We assert that wild lions can ipso facto not be observed in the Sahara desert.
sentences.chinese: 我们断言事实上撒哈拉沙漠中不可能有野生狮子。

sentences.english: Dengue is present in sub-Saharan Africa but often unrecognized.
sentences.chinese: 登革热存在于撒哈拉以南非洲，但往往识别不到。

sentences.english: The Sahara desert is a natural barrier that separates Northern and Central Africa.
sentences.chinese: 撒哈拉沙漠是分隔北非和中非的天然屏障。

sentences.english: A member of a nomadic Berber people of the Sahara.
sentences.chinese: 一个撒哈拉沙漠游牧的柏柏尔民族成员。

sentences.english: Sub-Saharan Africa remains the region most heavily affected by HIV.
sentences.chinese: 南撒哈拉非洲是艾滋病毒感染最严重的区域。

pinyin: Ta3 ke4 la1 ma3 gan1 Sha1 mo4

definition: Andes mountain chain of South America
